repl_description:
A fintech wealth management dashboard providing comprehensive portfolio analytics and financial metrics visualization. The application features portfolio value tracking, interactive asset allocation analysis, portfolio rebalancing recommendations, and extensive risk analysis metrics including volatility, beta, Sharpe ratio, and maximum drawdown calculations.

The system delivers real-time performance monitoring through a responsive web interface, with automated portfolio optimization tools including target allocation comparisons and calculated transaction recommendations. 

Tech Stack:
- React.js
- Redux
- Material-UI
- Real-time data integration
- Interactive charting libraries
- Risk analysis calculation engine
- Responsive web design
